mapper.select: SELECT spu.id, spu.title, spu.description, spu.cover_img, spu.price, spu.discount_price, spu.tags, sdi.img AS display_img FROM spu JOIN spu_display_img sdi ON spu.id = sdi.spu_id AND sdi.online = 1 AND sdi.delete_time IS NULL WHERE spu.id = #{spuId} AND spu.online = 1 AND spu.delete_time IS NULL ORDER BY sdi.sort
